channel.title: WinstonBrown.me
channel.description: winstonbrown.me is a personal blog where Winston Brown shares his journey and insights as a self-taught software engineer. The blog covers a variety of topics, including software development, personal projects, career advice, and explorations into new technologies. It reflects Winston's passion for continuous learning, problem-solving, and his unique perspective on the tech world.

item.title: State-Sponsored Job Boards
item.description: A guide to state-sponsored job boards across the U.S. and its territories, helping to find local job opportunities that may not be listed on larger platforms.
item.author: clouddevsolutions@gmail.com (Winston Brown)
